headline: Is Kimberly-Clark Set for a Rebound After Recent Earnings Beat in 2025?
summary: If you are sitting on the fence about what to do with Kimberly-Clark stock, you are definitely not alone. Whether you are a longtime holder of KMB or just considering the household products powerhouse as a possible addition to your portfolio, it is a natural time to wonder if the numbers add up in your favor. This year, the market has been sending some mixed signals. Kimberly-Clark’s stock price has inched up about 2.2% year-to-date and gained nearly 4.8% over the last month, but it is still...
